```r
d <- readLines("~cr173/Sta523/data/world_cup_goals_raw.txt")

l <- str_match_all(d, " id=\"([a-z0-9]*)\"")
m <- str_match_all(d, " class=\"([a-z ]*)\"")

dataset <- matrix(data=NA,nrow=193,ncol=13)
dataset <- data.frame(dataset)

for (i in 1:193)
{
  dataset[i, 1]<-l[[i]][,2]
  
  dataset[i, 2]<-m[[i]][,2]
}

```
